00033 /**
00034  * \file
00035  *         Device drivers header file for tmp102 temperature sensor in Zolertia Z1 WSN Platform.
00036  * \author
00037  *         Enric M. Calvo, Zolertia <ecalvo@zolertia.com>
00038  *         Marcus Lundén, SICS <mlunden@sics.se>
00039  */
00040 
00041 #ifndef __TMP102_H__
00042 #define __TMP102_H__
00043 #include <stdio.h>
00044 #include "i2cmaster.h"
00045 
00046 /* -------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00047 /* Init the temperature sensor: ports, pins, I2C, interrupts (XXX none so far),
00048 */
00049 void  tmp102_init(void);
00050 
00051 /* Write to a register.
00052     args:
00053       reg       register to write to
00054       val       value to write
00055 */
00056 void    tmp102_write_reg(u8_t reg, u16_t val);
00057 
00058 /* Read one register.
00059     args:
00060       reg       what register to read
00061     returns the value of the read register
00062 */
00063 u16_t tmp102_read_reg(u8_t reg);
00064 
00065 /* Read temperature in raw format
00066     no args needed
00067 */
00068 u16_t tmp102_read_temp_raw();
00069 
00070 /* Read only integer part of the temperature in 1deg. precision.
00071     no args needed
00072 */
00073 int8_t tmp102_read_temp_simple();
00074 
00075 /* -------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00076 /* Reference definitions */
00077 /* TMP102 slave address */
00078 #define TMP102_ADDR           0x48
00079 
00080 /* TMP102 registers */
00081 #define TMP102_TEMP           0x00    // read only
00082 #define TMP102_CONF           0x01    
00083 #define TMP102_TLOW           0x02    
00084 #define TMP102_THIGH          0x03   
00085 
00086 /* TMP102 Ports */
00087 /* Accelerometer hardware ports, pins and registers on the msp430 µC */
00088 #define TMP102_PWR_DIR        P5DIR
00089 #define TMP102_PWR_SEL        P5SEL
00090 #define TMP102_PWR_SEL2       P5SEL2
00091 #define TMP102_PWR_REN        P5REN
00092 #define TMP102_PWR_OUT        P5OUT
00093 #define TMP102_PWR_PIN        (1<<0)          // P5.0
00094 //#define TMP102_INT_PIN      (1<<7)          // P1.7
00095 
00096 
00097 /* -------------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00098 #endif /* ifndef __TMP102_H__ */
00099 
00100
